text:
An exhibition-cum-sale of handloom and handicrafts is being held at BHEL Manamagizh Mandram, R.C. Club, Ranipet. The exposition will be on till February 14.

The Gujarat Mela, organised by the firm Kalakshetra has displayed a variety of items.

The display consists of Odisha fame Ikkat sarees, Sonpuri cotton sarees, Gujarat cotton sarees, Odisha handloom sarees, churidhar materials, bed sheets, jewellery, footwear, wooden articles, toys, jute bags, leather items and many more.

While handloom items come with a special discount of 20 per cent, the handicraft products carry a discount of 10 per cent.

The exhibition cum sale will be open from 9.30 a.m. to 9 p.m., according to a press release. - Staff Reporter
title: Handlooms, handicrafts expo
